oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Accelerated spectral refinement part I: Simple eigenvalue
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ALAM, R
KULKARNI, RP
LIMAYE, BV
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: integral-operators
defect correction
eigenelements
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A general framework is developed for constructing higher order spectral refinement schemes for a simple eigenvalue. Well-known techniques for ordinary spectral refinement are carried over to higher order spectral refinement yielding faster rate's of convergence. Numerical examples are given by considering an integral operator.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF THE AUSTRALIAN MATHEMATICAL SOCIETY SERIES B-APPLIED MATHEMATICS, 41(), 487-507
